alert.note: Alert for Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL SOUTHERN PORTIONS OF LAKE POWELL THROUGH 830 PM MST... At 758 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Labyrinth Canyon, or 13 miles east of Page, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could be a hazard to boats, and those camping. Locations impacted include... NMS Beach, Labyrinth Canyon, Tower Butte, Antelope Island, Trapeze Cove, and Antelope Point Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Powell, be prepared for strong winds. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
